location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 5/17 Mutiny of Ratings at naval base, Jufair'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order. Circled index numbers written using blue crayon are also present in the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are circled, written in pencil and can be found in the top right of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains telegrams between Liutenant-Colonel Arnold Crawshaw Galloway, British Political Agent at Bahrain, and Liuetenant-Colonel Charles Geoffrey Prior, British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire, and repeated to the Government of India at New Delhi. These papers concern the 'mutiny' of officers of the Royal Indian Navy (RIN) attached to the Bahrain Naval Base at Jufair [Jufayr] officers which took the form of a one-day strike in solidarity with RIN officers in India.
